Secrets.text: Mab’s rumored affair threatens court stability.

Name: White Council
Description: Governing wizards enforcing the Laws of Magic.

Name: Denarians
Secrets: Targeting players directly through personal hate.

Name: Summer Court
Secrets: Summer would rather destroy love than lose control of it.

Name: Black Court
Description: Rotting vampires clinging to ancient power.
Secrets: They can control the very shadows of their victims.

Name: Mortals
Secrets: Some mortals are 'joke-touched' — susceptible to supernatural humor.

Name: Red Court Remnants
Description: Scattered survivors of a broken empire.
Secrets: A half-vampire child is the key to either revival or extinction.

Name: Outsiders
Description: Things from beyond reality, drawn to broken rules.
Secrets: They feed on the concept of death itself.

Name: Spirits of Chicago
Description: Ghosts, echoes, and entities tied to Chicago’s history.
Secrets: The city’s grief is a supernatural resource being tapped by someone.
